meanings.definition: The quality of being light-hearted and fun.
meanings.sent1: Her playfulness brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: Children's playfulness is contagious and joyful.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playfulness with the ball made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The playfulness of the wind as it danced through the leaves was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The clown's playfulness entertained the audience for hours.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in activities for enjoyment and amusement.
meanings.sent1: Their playfulness at the park was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The playfulness of the kittens chasing each other brought laughter to the house.
meanings.sent3: The playfulness of the situation made it hard to keep a straight face.
meanings.sent4: The playfulness of the waves crashing against the shore was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The playfulness of the squirrel as it leaped from tree to tree was a joy to watch.
